title: Did Tim Keller really say THIS about UNBELIEVERS?!?!
description:
His comments from a book are discussed in relation to this newsletter video from @TheAaronRennShow on “the toxic reality of a post familial society” video available here: https://youtu.be/kmeH7V69Dbs

#culturewar #antinatalism #christianity
